content: <collection xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim"> <record>   <controlfield tag="001">11765</controlfield>   <controlfield tag="005">20140918002846.0</controlfield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">ORCID</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Research infrastructure</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Denmark</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">National ORCID consortium</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">CRIS</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Pure</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="999" ind1="C" ind2="5">     <subfield code="x">Bryant, Rebecca (2014). What is ORCID? Available from http://vimeo.com/97150912</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="856" ind1="4" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="s">805474</subfield>     <subfield code="u">https://zenodo.org/record/11765/files/ORCID_Poster.pdf</subfield>     <subfield code="z">0</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="856" ind1="4" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="s">17796</subfield>     <subfield code="u">https://zenodo.org/record/11765/files/ORCID_Poster.png?subformat=icon-90</subfield>     <subfield code="x">icon-90</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="909" ind1="C" ind2="O">     <subfield code="o">oai:zenodo.org:11765</subfield>     <subfield code="p">openaire</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="700" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="u">Aalborg University Library</subfield>     <subfield code="a">Melchiorsen, Poul</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="245" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Implementering af ORCID i Danmark</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="542" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="l">open</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">provisional-user-zenodo</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a"><p>The poster (in Danish) presents&nbsp;the implementation of ORCID in Denmark. The DEFF funded project running from March 2014 - March 2016 have established a national ORCID consortium representing six out of the eight Danish Universities and two consortiums of all university colleges and cultural research institutions.&nbsp;</p>  <p>The project has developed an ORCID website (www.orcid.dk) that contains information about ORCID in Danish (and English)&nbsp;tailored to the national Danish setting. The website also provides a toolkit for ORCID implementers containing guidelines, marketing materials including flyers, posters and slides.&nbsp;</p>  <p>In order to increase the incentives for the project partners to implement ORCID and motivate their researchers to register their ORCIDs in the local CRIS&#39;s (based on Pure) the project partners funding is partly based on ambitious goals of reaching&nbsp;40 %, 60 % and 80 % of their FTE researchers.&nbsp;</p>  <p>&nbsp;</p>  <p>&nbsp;</p></subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">poster</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="260" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="c">2014-09-17</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="347" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="p">100</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="024" ind1="7" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="2">DOI</subfield>     <subfield code="a">10.5281/zenodo.11765</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="540" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="u">http://www.opendefinition.org/licenses/cc-by-sa</subfield>     <subfield code="a">Creative Commons Attribution Share-Alike</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="650" ind1="1" ind2="7">     <subfield code="a">cc-by-sa</subfield>     <subfield code="2">opendefinition.org</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="500" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">This poster was presented at the yearly Danish Research Library Association conference 18. - 19. September 2014.   Pictures in this poster are CC-SA from Rebecca Bryant  / Creative Commons License: by nc sa Available from: http://vimeo.com/97150912</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="100" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="u">DTU Library</subfield>     <subfield code="a">Elb\ufffd\ufffdk, Mikael K.</subfield>   </datafield> </record> </collection>
